rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious foyer designed in Art Deco style featuring geometric patterns and metallic finishes.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open concept living area with elegant Art Deco detailing, comfortable seating and decorative moldings.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Formal dining space with a statement chandelier and Art Deco inspired furniture layout.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen designed with efficiency in mind, incorporating retro Art Deco finishes and energy-efficient appliances.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Service area housing laundry, storage, and additional utilities in a functional layout with Art Deco accents.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Spacious, well-ventilated gym equipped with modern fitness equipment and designed to ensure privacy.

rooms.name: Open Space
rooms.description: Multi-purpose area that can serve as a home office or leisure space, integrated with the private gym and designed in Art Deco style.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Compact guest bathroom featuring modern fixtures with a nod to Art Deco detailing.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large double door with geometric Art Deco patterns, offering ease of access and a welcoming atmosphere.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Glass railing balcony providing outdoor space and light ventilation, aligning with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master suite featuring Art Deco-inspired decor, en-suite bathroom, and ample storage.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Bathroom
rooms.description: Luxury ensuite bath featuring modern fixtures with Art Deco accents.

rooms.name: Secondary Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom for a guest or child, integrating Art Deco elements in its design and layout.

openings.name: Balcony Access to Master Bedroom
openings.description: Private balcony providing outdoor access for the master bedroom with Vastu alignment in mind.

openings.name: Balcony Access to Secondary Bedroom
openings.description: Small balcony that offers light and fresh air, enhancing the overall ambiance of the room.
